title: Error "No protocol method IDeref.-deref defined for type undefined:" and crash if open DApp permissions
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: Error and crash if open DApp permissions


#### Expected behavior

Dapp permission screen is opened 

#### Actual behavior

Error "No protocol method IDeref.-deref defined for type undefined:" and crash

### Reproduction

[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status and create new account
- Profile -> DApp permissions



### Additional Information

[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
- Status version: nightly April 22 - 0.12.0(2019042202)
- iOS 12.2, real iphone 7 plus 
- Android 9, real Pixel xl

#### Logs

[Status.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/3102654/Status.log)
